input.name: nx
input.description: Number of cells to define over the Hillslope if x_custom is empty

input.name: discretization_type
input.description: Type of discretization along the Hillslope

input.name: x_custom
input.description: A vector of coordinates along the hillslope or a value : -1 if not known and computed based on xmin, xmax and temp

input.name: angle
input.description: A vector of slopes along the Hillslope for each x coordinate or a single value corresponding to a constant slope

input.name: z_custom
input.description: Altitude of the top of the hillslope at each x coordinate or -1 if not known

input.name: w
input.description: Width of the top of the hillslope at each x coordinate

input.name: soil_depth
input.description: A vector of soil's depth along the hillslope or a value if constant

input.name: Nt
input.description: Number of time values to describe the recharge

input.name: unit
input.description: Time unit of the time serie

input.name: recharge_values
input.description: A vector containing recharge values in m/unit or a single value if recomputed

input.name: time_custom
input.description: Time vector corresponding to the recharge chronicle or -1 if computed from tmin, tmax, Nt

input.name: recharge_period
input.description: Period used to compute a periodical recharge or -1 if recharge databased, 0 if random, inf if steady. Possible values : -1, 0, 'inf' or a -inf to inf

input.name: recharge_type
input.value-range: periodical, square, steady, random or databased
input.description: Type of used recharged in the simulation

input.name: perc_loaded
input.description: Percentage of the Hillslope Stock initially filled with water
